places_to_visit.name: Matira Beach
places_to_visit.description: Matira Beach is known for its stunning turquoise waters and white sandy beaches. It’s perfect for swimming, snorkeling, and relaxing by the sea.

places_to_visit.name: Mount Otemanu
places_to_visit.description: Mount Otemanu is a dormant volcano and the highest peak on Bora Bora. It offers breathtaking views of the island and the surrounding lagoon.

places_to_visit.name: Coral Gardens
places_to_visit.description: Coral Gardens is a snorkeling paradise with vibrant coral reefs and a diverse range of marine life. It’s an excellent spot for underwater photography.

places_to_visit.name: Lagoon Tour
places_to_visit.description: A lagoon tour offers the chance to explore Bora Bora’s crystal-clear waters, swim with rays and sharks, and enjoy the stunning scenery of the island’s lagoon.

places_to_visit.name: Bora Bora Pearl Farm
places_to_visit.description: The Bora Bora Pearl Farm provides insight into the pearl farming process and offers the opportunity to purchase beautiful Tahitian pearls.
